Follow us on social media throughout the 2020 legislative session.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Welcome to the 2020 Georgia State Legislative Session. We need YOUR help to protect every Georgian's civil rights and civil liberties.

Today, ACLU of Georgia members and supporters joined us at the Capitol to hand out pocket constitutions to your state legislators and reminded them to remain faithful to the U.S. Constitution. Check out our social media channels – Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram – to see photos of today's action!

This year is going to be another critical session where your civil liberties and civil rights are at stake. We must stand together for the sake of our families, communities, and nation.

Last session, we faced attacks on women's reproductive rights, voter rights, the LGBTQ+ community, the immigrant community, and a myriad of other civil liberties and civil rights.

As we move forward in this legislative session, please follow us on social media for late breaking news and rapid responses that you can take. In the meantime, visit our website to volunteer with us.

We look forward to continuing to work closely with you as we dare to create a more perfect union.

For justice,

Christopher Bruce, Esq.
Political Director, ACLU of Georgia
